entry.title: temporal parts
entry.summary:
Author: escyn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,390Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 131

Summary: [Jason lets himself drink in the sight of Dick underneath him. He is beautiful like this—flushed, shaking—chest coated in a deep blue kevlar he had never seen before two weeks ago. Jason takes it in now. Reinforced at the shoulders, right where the cowl would connect. Fingerstripes are still there—but the blue bleeds into a bat splashed along his heaving pecs. Undeniably Batman. In blue. Not unlike the red sigil etched into Jason’s own chest. The cruelty inflicted on them was different. Two men grown in different worlds, yet shaped by common griefs—common ghosts—both left hollow. Aching. Needing. By the same title, the same burden—] or, Jason Todd has been Batman for a very long time—has been alone for just as long. Maybe this Dick Grayson can fix that. chapter 2 is just art!

entry.title: of ice and love
entry.summary:
Author: schicki_micki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,270Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Jason Todd. American Ice Hockey Prodigy at only 20 years old, first overall pick, and a man many are scared off. With 6ft and 225lb and a rage nobody can stop, he's earned the name 'Red Hood'. A real nightmare from Gotham, the derby rivals of the Bludhaven Sirens. Richard 'Dick' Grayson, starplayer and captain of the Bludhaven Sirens, famous for his smooth skating and leadership. That's the reason he is tasked to look after their youngest player on the olympic roster. None other than Jason Todd, a type of player he despises and has avoided this far, despite their team's rivalries. Travel overseas, sharing a room, practice and playing on the same line. And they want to win gold.

entry.title: Common Grounds
entry.summary:
Author: MewSefet

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,296Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 185

Summary: What happens when you accidently start dating your son's English teacher? When Dick and Jason find themselves pushed together on a rainy day in their usual coffee shop, neither of them expect their lives are already intertwined. How casual flirting and mutual interest turns into dating, turns into an identity reveal that neither of them expect, but should have figured out earlier. Eg. the Detective!Dick Grayson/Teacher!Jason Todd fic that no one asked for. Including Jason is Damian's teacher, and Damian is 80% Dick's son and identity shenanigans in a Civillian!AU.

entry.title: You Gotta Take It From Me (I'm Gonna Take It From You)
entry.summary:
Author: Starless_Void

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,300Chapters: 19/24Kudos: 222

Summary: Jason makes his way back to Gotham about a year after his big fight with Bruce. He hunkers down in a new apartment, staying as far under the radar as possible to avoid any contact with the Bats- who would probably throw him in Arkham the first chance they got. If only that were his only problem. On top of staying out of the attention of the most paranoid people on the planet, Jason is trying to find a way to undo a stupid spell that has left him in a rather strange state. Returning to Gotham is probably up there in the stupidest decisions he's ever made, but it's his home too. As long as he lays low, doesn't rebuild his criminal empire, and keeps to himself, there shouldn't be any reason for the Bats to bother him.   Dick Grayson has lost Jason twice now. There won't be a third.
